text: Matthew Jay Roach (born June 14, 1957) is an American movie director, producer and screenwriter. He is best known for directing the Austin Powers movies and Meet the Parents.Stanford Magazine, July/Aug 2007 He also directed the comedy movie Dinner for Schmucks (2010), the HBO political dramas Recount (2008) and Game Change (2012), and the political comedy The Campaign (2012). His twelfth movie, the biographical drama Trumbo, was released on November 6, 2015 to positive reviews. He won two Emmy Awards (2008, 2012). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Emmy Award winning directors Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:American movie directors Category:American movie producers Category:American screenwriters Category:Businesspeople from Albuquerque, New Mexico Category:Writers from Albuquerque, New Mexico
title: Jay Roach
